sentences.sContent: Computer game pirates cost the industry twenty million pounds a year.
sentences.sCn: 电脑游戏盗版者每年要给该行业带来两千万英镑的损失。

synos.tran: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者

remMethod.val: pir(＝per 试验； 冒险) + ate → 冒险去拿他人的东西 → 掠夺

words.tran: 海盗的；非法翻印的，盗版的
海盗行为；剽窃；著作权侵害；非法翻印

trans.tranCn: 海盗, 盗印者, 盗版者, 侵犯专利权者
trans.tranOther: someone who sails on the seas, attacking other boats and stealing things from them
